subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols, a three-time National League M.V.P., left the Cardinals after helping them win the World Series last season. The Angels also signed the Rangers’ ace C. J. Wilson.
snippet: Albert Pujols, a three-time National League M.V.P., left the Cardinals after helping them win the World Series last season. The Angels also signed the Rangers’ ace C. J. Wilson.
